title: proposal: Ignore "#!" first line.
body:
by **seth.bunce**: 
Proposal: Go should ignore the first line of a program if it begins with "#!".

Precedent: The D programming language does this. (under Phases of Compilation step 2)
http://www.digitalmars.com/d/2.0/lex.html

Rationale: This would allow go programs to specify runners like shell scripts do.

Cost vs Benefit: Existing Go programs would not have to be modified. This capability
could be useful to some. Very low cost, low (maybe moderate) benefit.
